department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: Chunware; small blue bowl with red/ purple splotch; brown trim on rim; 5/8" wide lip
medium:
Chun ware
Stoneware with blue glaze and purple markings
text: While Chun ware shapes are usually simple and self-contained, this small, purple-splashed lavender-blue vessel shows how radiant Chun glazes can be. The key glaze ingredient is copper oxide which is fundmental to both the blue and purple colors seen here.
title: Saucer Bowl
